lexUnit.name: manufacturer.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the company or person that makes (something) on a large scale using machinery

sentence.text: With an appreciation of this , manufacturers have produced a whole range of equipment that can simulate a gentle tumbling stream , crashing waterfall or sparkling dancing fountain .
